#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int isZeroMin( int arr[10] ) {
	int min = arr[0];
	int pos = 0;
	for( int i = 1; i < 10; i++ ) {
		if( min >= arr[i] ) {
//			min = arr[i];
			pos = i;
		}
	}
	return pos;
}

int minimum( int arr[10] ) {
	int min = arr[1];
	int pos = 1;
//	pos = isZeroMin( arr );
//	if( min == arr[1] ) {
//		min = arr[1];
//		pos = 1;
//	}
//	cout<<"pos : "<<pos<<"\n";
	for( int i = 2; i < 10; i++ ) {
		if( min > arr[i] ) {
			min = arr[i];
			pos = i;
		}
	}
	if( min > arr[0] ) {
		pos = 0;
	}
	return pos;
}

int main() {
	int t,arr[10];
	cin>>t;

	while( t-- ) {
		for( int i = 0; i < 10; i++ ) {
			cin>>arr[i];
		}
		int min = minimum( arr );
		if( min == 0 ) {
			cout<<"10";
			while( arr[min]-- ) {
				cout<<"0";
			}
			cout<<"\n";
		}
		else {
			cout<<min;
			while( arr[min]-- ) {
				cout<<min;
			}
			cout<<"\n";
		}
	}
}
